mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_ACCESS_URL_LOG ( ACCESS_URL_ID, URL, PARAM_REF, PARAM_SHARETIME, PARAM_FROM, PARAM_ISAPPINSTALLED, PARAM_NAME, PARAM_UID, PARAM_EVENT, PARAM_NOWPAGE, PARAM_LASTPAGE, PARAM_V, PARAM_PLG_AUTH, PARAM_PLG_UIN, PARAM_PLG_USR, PARAM_PLG_DEV, PARAM_PLG_NLD, PARAM_PLG_VKEY, PARAM_PLG_VISITDSTIME, PARAM_AMP, PARAM_WIDTH, PARAM_TCDSP, PARAM_APPINSTALL, PARAM_TP, PARAM_LENGTH, PARAM_MTYPE ) VALUES
( #{item.url_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_ref,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_shareTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_from,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_isappinstalled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_event,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_nowPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_lastPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_v,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_auth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_uin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_usr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_dev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_nld,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_plg_vkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_visitDstTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_amp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_width,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_tcdsp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_appinstall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_tp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_length,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param_mType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT PARAM_FROM CHANNEL, COUNT(PARAM_FROM) CHANNEL_COUNT FROM T_ACCESS_URL_LOG WHERE PARAM_FROM IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CHANNEL
